Package Utility

Class CSVReader

java.lang.Object
Utility.CSVReader
Direct Known Subclasses:
CampDBManager, CampDBManager, EnquiryDBManager, ReportGenerator, SuggestionDBManager, UserDBManager
public class CSVReader extends Object
This class provides basic functionality for reading and manipulating CSV files. It includes methods to read, print, add, delete, and modify lines in a CSV file. Additionally, it handles the conversion of data types such as lists, sentences, booleans, and integers.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] a)
      Main method for testing the committee member functionalities.
      Parameters:
      a - Command-line arguments (not used).

    • getLines

      public static String[] getLines(String filepath)
      Returns an array of strings, with each string representing a line from the CSV file (excluding the header).
      Parameters:
      filepath - The path of the CSV file to read.
      Returns:
      An array of strings representing lines from the CSV file.

    • getLinesWithHeader

      public static String[] getLinesWithHeader(String filepath)
      Returns an array of strings, including the header and each line from the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filepath - The path of the CSV file to read.
      Returns:
      An array of strings representing lines from the CSV file with the header included.

    • printData

      public static void printData(String filepath)
      Prints the contents of the CSV file to the console.
      Parameters:
      filepath - The path of the CSV file to print.

    • addLine

      public static void addLine(String filepath, String line)
      Appends a line at the bottom of the CSV file, used to add a data value into the CSV.
      Parameters:
      filepath - The path of the CSV file to which the line will be added.
      line - The line to be added to the CSV file.

    • writeLine

      public static void writeLine(String filepath, String line, boolean newLine)
      Writes a line to a specified file path.
      Parameters:
      filepath - The path of the file to write to.
      line - The content of the line to be written.
      newLine - If true, appends a newline character after the line; if false, no newline character is appended.

    • deleteLine

      public static void deleteLine(String filepath, String firstEntry)
      Deletes a line from the CSV file based on the first entry (usually the name of the item).
      Parameters:
      filepath - The path of the CSV file from which the line will be deleted.
      firstEntry - The value of the first entry to identify the line to be deleted.

    • modifyLine

      public static void modifyLine(String filepath, String firstEntry, String newLine)
      Modifies a line in the CSV file based on the first entry.
      Parameters:
      filepath - The path of the CSV file in which the line will be modified.
      firstEntry - The value of the first entry to identify the line to be modified.
      newLine - The new line that will replace the existing line.

    • stringToList

      public static String[] stringToList(String stringList)
      Parses a string representing a list, e.g., "[BRANDON|CALVIN]", and returns an array of strings {"BRANDON", "CALVIN"}.
      Parameters:
      stringList - The string representation of a list.
      Returns:
      An array of strings representing the list.

    • listToString

      public static String listToString(String[] listOfStrings)
      Converts an array of strings into a string representing a list, e.g., {"BRANDON", "CALVIN"} to "[BRANDON|CALVIN]".
      Parameters:
      listOfStrings - The array of strings to be converted into a list.
      Returns:
      A string representing the list.

    • removeCommas

      public static String removeCommas(String str)
      Replaces commas in a string with a special pattern "%25 %5E &".
      Parameters:
      str - The input string.
      Returns:
      The string with commas replaced by "%25 %5E &".

    • getCommas

      public static String getCommas(String str)
      Replaces the special pattern "%25 %5E &" with commas in a string.
      Parameters:
      str - The input string with the special pattern.
      Returns:
      The string with "%25 %5E &" replaced by commas.

    • toBool

      Returns:
      The boolean value corresponding to the input string.
